body_html:
If a display that:

  • Is aligned
  • Displays the size
  • Display sthe type (I don't see how you can differenciate between float32 and float64 by looking at the values)
  • Does not display meaningless brackets (do these bracket actually convey information or are they completely useless ?)

is considered "legacy" then maybe pytorch is not going forward ?

body:
If a display that:

- Is aligned
- Displays the size
- Display sthe type (I don't see how you can differenciate between float32 and float64 by looking at the values)
- Does not display meaningless brackets (do these bracket actually convey information or are they completely useless ?)

is considered "`legacy`" then maybe pytorch is not going forward ?
